div.em: Current conditions as of 19 Apr 12:15 pm CDT

div.span: Partly sunny, with a high near 64. North wind around 11 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.
Areas of frost after 5am. Otherwise, partly cloudy, with a low around 36. North wind 3 to 7 mph.

A 30 percent chance of showers, mainly after 1pm. Areas of frost before 8am. Otherwise, mostly sunny, with a high near 63. Light west northwest wind becoming west 6 to 11 mph in the morning. Winds could gust as high as 18 mph.

h3.a: Message from The Illinois Department of Human Services Call4Calm Support Line

div.p:
Call4Calm
The Illinois Department of Human Services has launched a support line for Illinois citizens. It is called Call4Calm that is reachable via text. Individuals who want to speak with a mental health professional can text the word “TALK” or “HABLAR” (for Spanish speakers) to 552-020. Within 24 hours, the individual will receive a call from a mental health professional employed by a local . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Message from The Illinois Department of Human Services Call4Calm Support Line

p.a: read more

h3.a: Stay at home activity- Illinois Video Contest for students and parents!

div.p:
Hello!!
While the kids and adults are stuck at home until at least May 1 st , CSWEA-Illinois ( CSWEA.ORG ) has decided to host a fun, educational video contest to keep them entertained! Did I mention there is a $500 cash prize?!
With continuing toilet paper shortages and extra cleaning due to COVID-19, many . . .

h3.a: REMOTE LEARNING LINK Update Message to Families, Students and Staff: From Your Superintendent

div.p:
Dear Parents and Guardians,
In Beardstown District 15 the health, safety, and well-being of our students and staff are our top priorities. With the recently elevated discussion regarding the coronavirus disease (COVID-19) in the news, we want to take a moment to reinforce preventive safety measures and reference our process and communications.
We encourage our students, staff, and families to be . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about REMOTE LEARNING LINK Update Message to Families, Students and Staff: From Your Superintendent

p.a: read more

div.p:
Food Distribution sites are listed below.
Food Distribution Update: Distribution sites and times will remain the same. Starting Thursday, April 2, we are changing the days in which we are handing out food. Starting on Thursday, April 2 we will be handing out food for Thursday and Friday. On Monday, April 6, meals will be handed out for Monday, Tuesday, and Wednesday. Going forth while we are in this Stay-at-Home status, meals . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Food Distribution Sites
